posts.post_content:
Hello,

I am new to the site and find it very informative. I want to start to collect the T206 cards and not really sure where to begin. Should I only collect SGC or PSA - which is better for the 206's? 

I am looking for anything grade 4 or higher - PSA grade or the equivalent SGC. 

Thanks..... Ray

If you are simply collecting for the joy of collecting them SGC holders are much better looking for asthetics. If you are buying and expect to resell then a great amount of the time PSA commands more money. 

In 4's or better I think SGC begins to close the gap a little. I am sure you will find many opinions on this.

AND

you will be told that this post was put in the wrong forum. I am sure Leon will help move this over to the more general discussion forum.
